short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost browser audio volume up to 600%

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your audio experience with Volume Booster Max, the ultimate Chrome extension for amplifying sound beyond your device's default limits. Boost your volume up to 600% and enjoy loud audio whether you're streaming videos, listening to music, or on a video call.

Amplify sound output up to 6x the original volume.
Simple and intuitive interface with a smooth slider for precise control.
Works seamlessly across popular platforms like YouTube.
Adjustable per-tab volume settings to personalize your audio experience.
Lightweight and efficient design to ensure smooth performance without lag.

Enjoying quiet audio tracks or dialogue.
Enhancing your listening experience in noisy environments.
Boosting sound during presentations or group calls.

Note: Prolonged use of extreme volume levels may affect speaker quality. Use responsibly.

Take your audio to the next level with Volume Booster Max. Download now and experience sound like never before!
